channel.title: [PI] Adding 653 Items
channel.description:
im using PI Hybrid-pvp v3, im trying to add 653 items. these are the files i have..
-653 Models -itemdefinitions.xml -itemdefinitions.bin -equip.txt -obj.dat -obj.idx
where do i add each of these files please, iv checked many tutorials and i found these files but i havent found anything saying where to add them. iv got these current files im using..
